name: Full Reset
description:
A game about building a world and making sure no one figures out they're in a simulation. This game is in very early stages and I haven't added anything but the building mechanic. This game will hopefully receive weekly updates.

To quit the game, get past the tutorial and press the escape key. You can then press "Quit Game" to stop the application.

Keep in mind that I'm only one developer. Feedback is appreciated, but I can't do everything and this is really only a side project.
